title: Talalask - Central World Mall
description: Veggie food stall on the 7th floor of the mall -- go through the supermarket at the front of Central Food Hall, Talalask counter is in the food court at the back. Serves mock meats, Chinese soups, stir-fried dishes. Feb 2015 reported Carbonara is the only non-vegan dish (dairy).
streetAddress: Central Food Hall, 7th floor, Central World Shopping Mall, 494 Rajdamri Rd
